website_summaries.verdict: A valuable option if you’re looking for an affordable mountain bike helmet and don’t want to scrimp on safety and comfort features.
pros: Made for safety with multi-density EPS and thoughtful placement of foam pads
Aerodynamic design reduces resistance up to 40%
Antimicrobial padding is located at the chin strap and helmet
Available in four colors and two sizes
cons: Some consumers say it takes a while to get used to the chin strap design
Others say they wish there were more color choices

customer_reviews.title: Excellent helmet, Excellent customer service, Happy wife !
customer_reviews.text: *Edit 4th May 2019* Rock Bros Customer service contacted me about my earlier review. They provided me with a certificate of testing and with the proper labels to apply to the helmet to bring it into compliance. Now my wife can use this helmet and look stylish and feel safe, as well as being able to use it in her competitions. *Original review*Bought for cycling, as advertised, shocked to see it missing safety labeling and instructions required by US code. Unfortunate, because my wife loved the fit, magnetic buckle function, looks and everything else about this helmet. Without the proper testing and labeling it is also illegal for use in her upcoming triathlon.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lechner

customer_reviews.title: No safety compliance stickers
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet but lacks US safety compliance stickers so it would illegal to use in a sanctioned event.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, Goodlooking, and Functional
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, beautiful paint, and sturdy build. It's light and the aesthetic lines of the helmet are great. Includes a nice RockBros cycling cap as well. The magnetic straps took a while to get used to, but they're amazingly convenient. They're a great replacement to the Abus Gamechanger and an eyecatching helmet for any kit. However, despite the high quality, I do feel it's more of a $50 dollar item. There's not enough features to justify $60, I don't think.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Tran

customer_reviews.title: Runs small.  Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The size runs small. I wear a medium in every other helmet I own, but this one is tight. Also, the tightened in the back tends to rub the back of my head and actually cut into my head when I look to the left. I was able to rearrange the pads to minimize the irritation. I suggest you only consider helmets with MIPS! UPDATE: (10/11/20). When the vendor read my review, they immediately contacted me via email. They offered a free replacement in a large size. The new helmet arrived today and fits comfortably. I appreciate companies that go a step above to make things right. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: I don’t trust it. Says Triathlon and Mt. Bike.
customer_reviews.text: My 1st bicycle helmet ever. Fits true to sizing. Cool color. Super light weight. No sun visor included as advertised and in the reviews. I’m sure the magnetic lock is slick, but the strap is cheap & thin and Won’t stay together. No cap, no detachable pads, no detachable visor included. Only a tail light for my bike. I neither need nor want the light. Love the color. I like the adjustment band. Going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Turner

customer_reviews.title: Color is perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this helmet. The flat red and black match my specialized Venge perfectly! It’s also way smaller than my Bontrager helmet. Which always made me feel like a mushroom head. It’s also comfortable, and the magnetic clasp is great.
customer_reviews.author: Corbin Wiegerink

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Safe
customer_reviews.text: This is my second helmet to accompany my Purefix Fixed Gear bike. The color matches almost perfectly and the airflow is awesome. I really like the magnetic clip closure and the ease of it's removal especially with gloved hands. Pretty comfy overall and has some handy adjustments to make sure it's nice and secure. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S Ori

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This helmet fits me great. It feels comfortable and and doesn’t create any painful spots even after 10 hours. It’s vented well and has never bothered me on hot days. It looks aero and feels aero. While I like the magnetic latch system my one complaint would be the buckle. Where the strap loops through the buckle is the weak point. It comes loose easily and I need to readjust it every ride. This doesn’t bother me much because I love the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Williams

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The helmet came in exactly as advertised and the fit was perfect. The helmet buckles under the chin with a magnetic clasp and has been easy to get accustom too. It took a couple of times to get used to the clasp but after that you can do it with ease. The helmet is very lite weight and looks fantastic. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Wore During IRONMAN Texas '19 - Great fit
customer_reviews.text: So recently needed a new helmet for IRONMAN Texas and this helmet was a great buy! fit well, vented very well.
customer_reviews.author: Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Nothing wrong so far
customer_reviews.text: Helmet fits nicely, is lightweight, looks nice, and the clasp-mechanism is nice (this one easily slides into place to lock itself as opposed to other helmets where you squeeze the two side plastic forks which slide out to disengage the clap). Haven't crashed yet (knock on wood) so I cannot attest to it's durability.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Grotke

customer_reviews.title: Beauty and quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the most gorgeous helmet. I love it because it matches my bike!
customer_reviews.author: Feathermate

customer_reviews.title: The vents really work well for providing the proper coolness when needed
customer_reviews.text: I needed a newer and more advance technology in the bicycle industry without the heavy price tag. I did a lot research and read a lot reviews and this one from RockBros had some input of information on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Stoney

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It became my favorite helmet, super light and fits perfect
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Rubio

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow what an amazing helmet I will say is better than my specialized echelon ii,excellent price and fit, thankyou ROCKBROS
customer_reviews.author: Shenajul islam

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet, happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and an excellent first. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet.  Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit of the helmet. Only thing is the clasp for the strap takes some getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon K.a

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, would rather it have a normal buckle than the magnet clip which can be a pain to get lined up.
customer_reviews.author: cody loop

customer_reviews.title: Light and deep, fits really well.
customer_reviews.text: Would have been nice to have a protective net inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Light weight.
customer_reviews.text: I like the color, is light weight, comfortable. I definitely would buy it again or another color.
customer_reviews.author: Anyelo Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Pretty colors, great for colder rides
customer_reviews.text: The helmet is pretty and fits well. Just hard to itch any place on head and gets pretty hot on rides.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Bahmer

product_meta.title: ROCK BROS Road Bike Helmet for Adults Aero Bike Helmet TT Triathlon Helmet for Road Bikes Men Women
feature_bullets: SMALLER AIR RESISTANCE: ROCK BROS Newest road bike aero helmet, teardrop shape provides a best aerodynamic efficiency and ensure the air flow more smoothly. In the Wind Tunnel Testing, ROCK BROS aero helmet get a excellent performance. Comparison with ordinary road bike helmet, this aero helmet have more than 40% decrease of air resistance.

EXCELLENT HEAT DISSIPATION: Comfortable temperature from excellent heat dissipation. Called "FORCED AIR COOLING", A wider vent in the front of helmet working with 4 deep internal channels insides are the best combination of aerodynamics and ventilation, which can aspirate more cool air to keeping the comfortable temperature, give you a enjoyable cycling experience.

SAFETY CONSTRUCTION: Aero helmet is made of Multi-Density EPS and high toughness PC shell with Integral Moulding Technology. Because of this well impact toughness material, helmet protection system can work great while hitting.

EASY-USE ADJUSTMENT SYSTEM: The latest magnetically helmet fastener, side strap adjust button and size adjust dial make up the easy-use adjustment system, which is good for the helmet adjust to different head size and more suitable for both men and women. (Suitable For Head Circumference from 22 to 24 inches)

COMFORTABLE & DETACHABLE PAD: Detachable and washable pad design for increased comfort and absorb sweat. Also you don't need worry about pad getting wet, good gas permeability can keep pad clean and no peculiar smell.
